message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a special opportunity to secure an exceptional value for such a high-quality item.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $9,500 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get it for a bit less. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $9,200. This is the highest I can go while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us. I look forward to your consideration.
